qas.question: Over what does the AVL  make rules governing?
What is the AVL standard based on?
Who is exempt from the standard and uses their own?

context: The AVL, created by the <a0_0>Valencian parliament<a0_0/>, is in charge of dictating the official rules governing the <a1_0>use of Valencian<a1_0/>, and its standard is based on the <a2_0>Norms of Castelló<a2_0/> (Normes de Castelló). Currently, <a3_0>everyone who writes<a3_0/> in Valencian uses this standard, except the <a4_0>Royal Academy of Valencian Culture<a4_0/> (Acadèmia de Cultura Valenciana, RACV), which uses for Valencian an independent standard.
